elements.text: While you're in a shopping mall, your tremor is worse than usual while trying on clothes. You wonder whether to call your doctor but worry they will think you are overreacting. You decide to call and make an appointment while feeling...

elements.name: Symptoms at Shopping Mall_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
